title: Electrocatalytic hydrogenation of the formyl group and heteroaromatic ring in furfural using ruthenium supported on activated carbon cloth
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00260A, Paper

Meheryar R. Kasad, James E. Jackson, Christopher Saffron
Electrocatalytic hydrogenation (ECH) was explored as a mild technique (≤50 ℃, ambient pressure) to produce valuable products from furfural, a promising biomass-derived platform chemical. In situ hydrogen equivalents made by...
